item.title: 18 ex-NBA players charged in $4M fraud scheme
item.description: Eighteen former NBA players have been arrested on charges alleging they defrauded the league's health and welfare benefit plan out of about $4 million, according to an indictment Thursday.

item.title: Staples: Own vax rules unchanged by L.A. order
item.description: In the wake of the L.A. ordinance, Staples Center said it "will continue to follow the protocols established by the (LACDPH) which requires guests to show proof of being fully vaccinated or providing proof of a negative COVID-19 test 72 hours prior to."

item.title: Kyrie ineligible for Fri. preseason game at home
item.description: Brooklyn Nets star Kyrie Irving is listed as "ineligible to play" in Friday's home preseason game against the Bucks, another strong indication he has not met New York's vaccination requirement.

item.title: Warriors' Kuminga out at least week due to knee
item.description: Jonathan Kuminga has a strained patella tendon in his right knee and will be reevaluated in a week, according to Warriors coach Steve Kerr.

item.title: Sources: Clips' Preston to miss significant time
item.description: Clippers rookie point guard Jason Preston suffered a right foot injury prior to the start of training camp and is expected to miss a large part of the season after having surgery, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Ariza has ankle surgery, out at least two months
item.description: Los Angeles Lakers forward Trevor Ariza, who has missed most of training camp because of his ankle, underwent an arthroscopic debridement procedure Wednesday and will be re-evaluated in about eight weeks.

item.title: 'You like games? We have one tonight': Spurs channel 'Squid Game'
item.description: The South Korean drama on Netflix has become a runaway hit replete with its own memes. The Spurs got into the action to promote a game.

item.title: LeBron James, Kevin Durant, Benny the Bull and Lil Penny highlight hoop fans' stroll down 'NBA Lane'
item.description: The NBA's 75th anniversary tips off with a star-studded nod to its rich history

item.title: Where the Ben Simmons-76ers saga stands now, and where it could be headed
item.description: The Sixers' first preseason game is in the books, and All-Star Ben Simmons continues his holdout. What now?

item.title: NBA preseason: The latest injury updates on Klay, Zion and Kawhi
item.description: With the first week of training camp in the books, we round up the latest injury news on the NBA's biggest stars.

item.title: NBArank: Why LeBron fell from the No. 1 spot for 2021-22
item.description: Does LeBron's reign continue? Does Giannis add another accolade to his list? See where the final five superstars land in NBArank 2021.

item.title: 5-on-5: LeBron's ranking, overrated stars and the biggest surprises
item.description: Was King James' ranking unfair? Our experts break down this year's countdown.

item.title: NBArank 2021: These stars just missed a spot in the league's upper tier
item.description: Risers, fallers and the return of Klay Thompson mark the highlights as our annual NBA player rankings continue.

item.title: More NBArank: Five former No. 1 picks check in at 100-51
item.description: Our countdown of the league's best players is back. Here's a look the big names from Nos. 100-51.
